common_errors.cause: Package name in turbo.json doesn't match package.json
solutions: Check package.json 'name' field matches filter
Use --filter=./apps/myapp for path-based filtering
Run 'turbo ls' to list all packages
Check inputs in turbo.json match actual dependencies
Add globalDependencies for config files
Use 'turbo run build --summarize' to debug
Run 'turbo run build --graph' to visualize
Extract shared code to new package
Remove direct circular imports

common_errors.cause: Remote cache not configured or team not linked
solutions: Run 'turbo login' to authenticate
Run 'turbo link' to connect to team
Set TURBO_TOKEN and TURBO_TEAM env vars in CI

common_errors.cause: Task referenced but not defined in turbo.json
solutions: Add task to pipeline in turbo.json
Check for typos in task name
Ensure package.json has the script defined
Check dependsOn references valid task names
Use ^build for dependency's build, not build
Verify dependent package has the task

common_errors.cause: Different package managers in workspace packages
solutions: Ensure all packages use same package manager
Set packageManager field in root package.json
Remove conflicting lock files

common_errors.cause: Previous build artifacts blocking fresh build
solutions: Add outputs to turbo.json for proper caching
Run 'turbo run build --force' to bypass cache
Clean output directories before build

common_errors.cause: turbo.json not in root or malformed
solutions: Create turbo.json in monorepo root
Validate JSON syntax
Check working directory is correct

common_errors.cause: Referenced env var not available in build context
solutions: Add to globalEnv or env in turbo.json
Ensure .env file is loaded
Set variable in CI environment
